Package ecs

Class EntitySystem

java.lang.Object
ecs.EntitySystem
public abstract class EntitySystem extends Object
The `EntitySystem` class is an abstract base class for systems in an Entity-Component-System (ECS) architecture. It manages entities, their components, and provides a framework for processing entities based on specific components. Subclasses should extend this class and implement the `process` method to define the logic executed on each entity.
Since:
1.0

    • getSystems

      public static Set<EntitySystem> getSystems(Class<? extends Component> clazz)
      Retrieves a set of systems associated with a given component class.
      Parameters:
      clazz - The component class.
      Returns:
      An unmodifiable set of systems that depend on the specified component class.

    • canStay

      public boolean canStay(Entity entity)
      Checks if an entity can stay in the system based on its component flags.
      Parameters:
      entity - The entity to be checked.
      Returns:
      `true` if the entity meets the component requirements, otherwise `false`.
